<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>false</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>false</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>pm_project</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Set Project Data without conditions</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[g_scratchpad.plannedStartDate = current.start_date;
g_scratchpad.plannedEndDate = current.end_date;
g_scratchpad.plannedDuration = current.duration;
g_scratchpad.actualStartDate = current.work_start;
g_scratchpad.actualEndDate = current.work_end;
g_scratchpad.actualDuration = current.work_duration;
g_scratchpad.state = current.state;
g_scratchpad.percentComplete = current.percent_complete;
g_scratchpad.allowDatesOutsideSchedule = current.allow_dates_outside_schedule;
g_scratchpad.change_planned_date_from_actual_for_manual = gs.getProperty('com.snc.project.change_planned_date_from_actual_for_manual','true');
g_scratchpad.isFinancialPlanningPmoActivated = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.financial_planning_pmo');
g_scratchpad.isAgileActive = (GlidePluginManager().isActive('com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0') || GlidePluginManager().isActive('com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp'));
g_scratchpad.enable_resource_planning = gs.getProperty('sn_pw.enable_resource_planning','false');

var isCascadeDelete  = gs.getProperty('com.snc.project_task_cascade_delete','false');
g_scratchpad.isCascadeDeletePropertyEnabled = isCascadeDelete;

g_scratchpad.initialApprovedStartDate =  current.getDisplayValue('start_date');
var duration = new GlideDuration();
duration.setValue(current.duration);
g_scratchpad.initialDuration = duration.getDurationValue();
g_scratchpad.planningConsoleObj = {
	is_topTask:false,
	ifTopTaskDoesItHaveSubProjects:false
};

if(current.getValue('top_task') === current.getValue('sys_id')){
	g_scratchpad.planningConsoleObj.is_topTask = true;
	var ga = new GlideAggregate('pm_project');
	ga.addQuery('top_task',current.getValue('sys_id'));
	ga.query();
	if(ga.getRowCount() > 1)
		g_scratchpad.planningConsoleObj.ifTopTaskDoesItHaveSubProjects	=true;
}

if(current.isValidField('resource_assignee') && current.isValidField('group_resource_assignee')){
	g_scratchpad.isAttributeBasedPlanning = ProjectManagementUtils.isAttributeBasedPlanned(current, true);
}

var isPluginActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('sn_ppm_collab');
g_scratchpad.hasSlackChannel = false;
g_scratchpad.hasTeamsChannel = false;

var utils = new ProjectManagementUtils();
if(isPluginActive){
	var userHasAccess = utils.canAccessCollaborationTool(current.getUniqueValue());
	g_scratchpad.hasSlackChannel = current.collaborate_on == 'slack' && userHasAccess;
	g_scratchpad.hasTeamsChannel = current.collaborate_on == 'msteams' && userHasAccess; 
}

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-12-21 07:18:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>0ae3096b87830300b6f8578c87cb0b85</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set Project Data without conditions</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_0ae3096b87830300b6f8578c87cb0b85</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-23 05:32:55</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before_display</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0ae3096b87830300b6f8578c87cb0b85"/>
</record_update>
